title: Predicting Community Note Helpfulness with LLMs
summary: Note-only inference benchmark using Gemini + baselines; early-stop policies and ROC-AUC.
body:
## Problem
Can LLMs predict whether a Community Note will be marked helpful? We test note-only inference to reduce latency and API cost.

## Approach
Compare Gemini, local baselines, and rule-based early-stop policies on historical notes. Evaluate using ROC-AUC and calibration.

## Results
- ROC-AUC: **0.87**
- F1: **0.79**

## Learnings
Prompt structure matters more than model size in note-only setting.
